        public static ViSdk init(android.content.Context context)

        Returns:
        initialized ViSdk

      • init

        public static ViSdk init(android.content.Context context,
                         ViOptions options)
        Main method for Vi SDK initialization. Add "ViSdk.init(this);" in your application onCreate method.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        options - optional parameter, used for more precise ad targeting.
        Returns:
        initialized ViSdk

      • registerExternalAdapter

        public abstract void registerExternalAdapter(ViExternalAdTracker viExternalAdTracker)

      • createVideoAd

        public abstract ViVideoAd createVideoAd(ViAdPlacement placement,
                                        ViAdView viAdView)
        Creates ViVideoAd instance.

        ViVideoAd instance is required for each Ad view. May be multiple ViVideoAd instances across project.

        Parameters:
        placement - Instantiated ViApPlacement
        viAdView - Instantiated ViAdView
        Returns:
        ViVideoAd instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if ViSdk was not initialized
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if placement or viAdViews is null

      • createVideoAd

        public abstract ViVideoAd createVideoAd(ViAdPlacement placement,
                                        ViAdView viAdView,
                                        ViAdCallback callback)
        Creates ViVideoAd instance.

        ViVideoAd instance is required for each Ad view. May be multiple ViVideoAd instances across project.

        Parameters:
        placement - Instantiated ViApPlacement
        viAdView - Instantiated ViAdView
        callback - callbacks to be triggered on ad playback/interaction events
        Returns:
        ViVideoAd instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if ViSdk was not initialized
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if placement or viAdViews is null
